org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.util

Class PPointLocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.piccolox.util.PLocator
      • edu.umd.cs.piccolox.util.PNodeLocator
        • org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.util.PPointLocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PPointLocator
extends edu.umd.cs.piccolox.util.PNodeLocator
    A PNodeLocator that locates itself based on a known point. Generally defeats the purpose of a locator.
    See Also:
